content.rendered:
An Inflation-Proof Stablecoin
Contract Address
Quick Start Guide

What is LendrUSD?

LendrUSD (USDL) is a flatcoin: a stablecoin pegged to the US inflation index (CPI). This makes USDL inflation-proof.

Our Quick Start Guide will show you how to create USDL in less than 5 minutes.

Video Guides

Spending Power of the US Dollar Over Time

Stablecoin holders lost over $9,000,000,000 to inflation in 2022 and 3.8% per year on average.

⚠️ You can try the Lendr system nearly risk-free with the Lendr “Love It or Leave Free” Guarantee! 

LendrUSD vs Standard Stablecoins

Protection from inflation and a bear market

LendrUSD offer a unique set of features not seen in any other stablecoin.

  • Inflation-Proof: Maintain your spending power.
  • Decentralized: More reliable and resilient.
  • Over-Collateralized: Backed using verifiable on-chain assets.
  • Rewards System: Earn rewards with stablecoins by staking them in our defi lending platform.
    • 100% of defi loan revenue is sent to stakers.
Video Guides
Launch App

Lendr (LNDR) - Reward Token

Collect the Revenue Generated By USDL Loans!

Lendr (LNDR) is the reward token for LendrUSD (USDL).

  • 100% of the fees generated by USDL loans are sent to the Lendr staking pool.
  • Lendr has a limited supply, no new tokens can be minted!
  • Early adopter rewards: Stability Pool rewards are greater at launch and reduce over time! 

You can earn Lendr by staking USDL in the Stability Pool.

The Lendr Global Reward Pool shares rewards from all Lendr Stablecoins to all Lendr Reward tokens!

Lendr (LNDR) is the reward token for LendrUSD (USDL).

  • 100% of the fees generated by USDL loans are sent to the Lendr staking pool.
  • Lendr has a limited supply, no new tokens can be minted!
  • Early adopter rewards: Stability Pool rewards are greater at launch and reduce over time! 

You can earn Lendr by staking USDL in the Stability Pool.

The Lendr Global Reward Pool shares rewards from all Lendr Stablecoins to all Lendr Reward tokens!

Listings

Contract Address
Buy Now

To learn more please visit our Youtube Channel to watch the Lendr Network FAQ Series or read our Documentation.

*Lendr returns calculated with weekly compounding. This is for estimation purposes only, APRs vary based on multiple factors, returns are not guaranteed and there are inherent risks associated with crypto investments. View our disclaimer for more information.
